Module kivakit.core
Package com.telenav.kivakit.core.vm

Interface JavaTrait

All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseResourceSettingsStore, BaseSettingsStore, CoreUnitTest, Deployment, GsonSerializationProject, KivaKit, KryoUnitTest, MemorySettingsStore, Project, PropertiesSerializationProject, ResourceFolderSettingsStore, SettingsProject, SettingsRegistry, UnitTest
public interface JavaTrait
Trait providing access to the Java virtual machine, system properties and environment variables
Author:
jonathanl (shibo)
